verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Nothing between my soul and my Savior, Naught of this world's delusive dream; I have renounced all sinful pleasure, Jesus is mine; there's nothing between.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Nothing between my soul and the Savior, So that His blessed face may be seen; Nothing preventing the least of His favor, Keep the way clear! Let nothing between.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Nothing between, like worldly pleasure, Habits of life though harmless they seem, Must not my heart from Him e'er sever, He is my all, there's nothing between.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Nothing between, like pride or station; Self or friends shall not intervene, Tho' it may cost me much tribulation, I am resolved; there's nothing between.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Nothing between, e'en many hard trials, Tho' the whole world against me convene; Watching with prayer and much self denial, I'll triumph at last, with nothing between.
